description.lang: Oomi Bulb is a low-cost Z-Wave LED module which allows control (on/off/dim) with the use of Z-Wave. Its a bulb has a Smart RGB LED, which can be used to add colour to your home. The bulb has 5 main colour channels available for you to adjust: Red, Green, Blue, Warm White and Cold White. You can configure its colour according to your favour.The Bulb is also a security Z-wave device and supports the Over The Air (OTA) feature for the products firmware upgrade.
The association group 1 is the Z-Wave Lifeline group.The Hail CC and Basic Report CC (configurable) can be sent to the associated nodes in association group 1.

In this group, the Basic Set, Switch Binary Set, Switch Multilevel Start Level Change, Switch Multilevel Stop Level Change, Switch Multilevel Set, Scene Activation Set commands would be sent to the associated nodes in association group 2when the Bulb receives the Basic Set, Switch Binary Set, Switch Multilevel Start Level Change, Switch Multilevel Stop Level Change, Switch Multilevel Set, Scene Activation Set commands from the main controller.

name.lang: Enable/disable to lock the configuration parameters.

description.lang: Enable/disable to lock the configuration parameters.
Disable.
Enable.
Reset your Bulb.
Reset all configuration parameters to default settings.
Reset the Bulb to factory default settings.

name.lang: Enable/disable to send out a report when the Bulbs color is changed.

description.lang: Enable/disable to send out a report when the Bulbs color is changed.
Disable.
Enable and the Hail CC is selected.

name.lang: Enable/disable the function of using external switch to turn on/off the bulb.

description.lang: Enable/disable the function of using external switch to turn on/off the bulb.
Disable
Enable.

name.lang: Enable/disable the function of using external switch to change the bulbs color.

description.lang: Enable/disable the function of using external switch to change the bulbs color.
Disable
Enable.

name.lang: Configure which notification report would be sent when the state of Bulb is changed.

description.lang: To configure which notification report would be sent in association group 1 when the state of Bulb is changed.
Send Nothing.
Send Hail CC.
Send Basic Report CC.
